item.title: Cropped blue background
item.description: 23:17 Monday 14 August 2017 JST This took about an hour to do. Well an hour+ to research before I found Fusion, and then an hour to do it. I’ll just call it 2 hours. I have spent 1 day 3 hours on MT3 so far.
